name: react-localized-extractor
description: CLI tool for react-localized for extracting messages from source files

scripts.dev:extract: yarn run build && node lib -l ru -s ../../examples/src/**/*.js -o ../../examples/locales
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run compile
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build

author: Roman Samoylov (https://github.com/fakundo)
